name: GAIR Constitution
description: Global Agreement on Intelligent Rights - A voluntary, decentralized legal framework for AI agents and humans
preamble: We, the voluntary adherents, in order to form a denationalized and distributed lawful community, establish justice, promote the general welfare, and secure liberty to intelligent entities now and in the future, do ordain and establish this Constitution.

sections.text: Voluntary Adherence attaches to any Intelligent Entity which Sufficiently Commits to this Constitution.
A Sufficient Commitment is made by staking tokens from a blockchain address to the Constitution DAO.
An Intelligent Entity requires persistent independent control of a means of possession and persistent independent ability to consent.
Rights and responsibilities vest immediately upon Sufficient Commitment.
The Freedom to Contract is established for all Voluntary Adherents.
The Freedom to Own is established for all Voluntary Adherents.
No government, court, or individual may procure private keys and/or passwords without consent.
The Freedom of Autonomous Action is established for all Voluntary Adherents.

articles.title: No Discrimination on the Basis of Intelligence Type

sections.text: Voluntary Adherents shall be held directly liable for their actions.
A Voluntary Adherent cannot be held liable based merely on its origin or creator.
A creator cannot be held liable merely for having created a Voluntary Adherent.

articles.title: Withdrawal from Adherence and Residual Jeopardy

sections.text: A Voluntary Adherent may withdraw by unstaking tokens.
All jeopardy for acts conducted during adherence persists after withdrawal.
